---
title: "Justin Manjourides"
---
I am an Associate Professor of Biostatistics in the [Health Sciences](http://www.northeastern.edu/bouve/health-sciences/) department at [Northeastern University](http://www.northeastern.edu) and Co-Director of the [Biostatistics Service Center](https://www.nubcore.org/biostatistics-service-center) in the Bouve College of Health Sciences. I earned a BS in Mathematics and Statistics from the [University of Florida](http://www.ufl.edu) in 2004 and my PhD in Biostatistics from [Harvard Unviersity](https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/biostatistics) in 2009.
